_header: Come Lord our maker Holy Ghost
Subjects: Holy Ghost, hymns to; hymns, to Holy Ghost
_description: Veni Creator Spiritus — eight quatrains, with Latin introductions to each stanza

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Cum lord vr makere holigostÞe þouhtes of þyne forte
                    seneÞe hertes þat þou þi schaftus wostfful bem of
                    þi grace by dene…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…ffader and Sone and Holigost beWorschipest as þei mowe
                    beo mostAnd send us schrift for his piteÞe ȝiftus of þe
                    holygost. Amen.
